Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    This class deals with how the Level is created and stored in the game.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addRespawn(Tile tile)
      Method that add the parameter tile to the list of object to respawn
      static void nextLevel()
      Move to next Maze
      static void openChest()
      When the hero has obtained all the hearts in a given level,the goal(chest) changes state and all monster that can awake are now activated.
      void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
      This will draw the representation of the current Level.
      static void restart()
      Restart the current Maze
      static void takeGoal()
      Upon taking the goal, the goal should changed into a "taken goal" state and all monsters should be deleted from the game.Monster respawn should be disabled once the goal has been taken.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This will draw the representation of the current Level. Top part of chest is only shown when all hearts are taken. This Method also try to respawn Monsters if its possible to

      • addRespawn

        public static void addRespawn(Tile tile)
        Method that add the parameter tile to the list of object to respawn

      • openChest

        public static void openChest()
        When the hero has obtained all the hearts in a given level,the goal(chest) changes state and all monster that can awake are now activated.

      • takeGoal

        public static void takeGoal()
        Upon taking the goal, the goal should changed into a "taken goal" state and all monsters should be deleted from the game.Monster respawn should be disabled once the goal has been taken.

      • nextLevel

        public static void nextLevel()
        Move to next Maze

      • restart

        public static void restart()
        Restart the current Maze
